entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add FileNotFoundException.ThrowIfNotFound throw helper. #96312
  • Strange code fragments #96310
  • Tiped client registration issue #96308
  • Corrupted function parameter value in Release configuration (overwritten by the first argument value). #96306
    9.0.0
  • Provide access to dynamically created instruments via DI #96305
  • Test failure System.Globalization.Tests.CultureInfoAll.TestAllCultures_Nls #96302
  • File Providers should produce metrics #96300

Closed

  • Test failure System.Globalization.Tests.IcuTests.IcuShouldBeLoaded #96301
  • Test failure System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.UnsupportedImplicitConversionTest #96303
  • Offer Azure storage as a FileProvider #96304
  • System.Tests.StringTests failing on windows Release NativeAOT_Libraries leg #96279

PullRequests

Created

  • PGO: Profile Buffer.Memmove's length #96311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Ensure that ICU is loaded in tests before checking its version #96288
    area-System.Globalization

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Set `bbFalseTarget` upon `BBJ_COND` initialization/modification #96265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enhance OSX's ProcessManager to extract process names from their paths #96287
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals for small values #93191
    area-System.Text.Encoding, tenet-performance, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Override DbConnection.DbProviderFactory for ODBC/OleDB #96290
    area-System.Data.Odbc
  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • [Bug]: `-getProperty` shows workloads update message #37520
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure that parameter default value don't change #30249
    Backlog
  • APICompat misses a breaking change where an interface removes a method that was present on a base interface #36502

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2341093 #37654

Updated

  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers

    17.6
  • Long switch expression is duplicated in `InferTypesWorker_DoNotCallDirectly` overloads #66116

    Backlog

    17.6 P3

Created

  • #66116 Long switch expression is duplicated in InferTypesWorker_DoNot… #71412

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor 8 Render mode breaks migrations over 3rd party components. #53008
  • Auth For Blazor To Be One #53007
  • [Feature Request][ Blazor New API Security end points Please have better Linkage between new security api end points /login / logout etc storing of tokens and the Blazor Web App New Project Template #53006
  • SignalR throws error on interface type method parameters (both client and server side) #53001
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #52999
  • Perf improvement: mvc, updates #52997
  • Record metrics for user account activities #52996

Closed

  • MapIdentityApi IdentityUser requires email instead of username in .Net 8 RC1 #51122
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #53000
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #52990
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter, updates #52998
  • Calling protected api from MainLayout.razor results in a loop, from an Azure AD Authenticated Blazor Wasm PWA #23363
    Planning: WebUI
  • Hot Reload (Blazor WASM) not working when Solution Configuration is not Debug #41867
    Backlog
  • Included .resx file throws error when containing project is referenced from other project (.NET 6) #48916
  • Asp.Net Core API controller memory leak repopend #45098 #48641
    Discussions

PullRequests

Updated

  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [release/8.0] Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52790
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-hosting, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Random black screen in MAUI Blazor. #19588
  • toolkit:MediaElement does not start when asked to play. #19587
  • I Want to disabled minisize button and close button,but I can't find how to setting it. #19586
  • Shell.PresentationMode = NotAnimated does not work on ios. #19584
  • Button does not work properly inside of RadioButton.ControlTemplate #19583
  • IsEnabled Not Updating as Expected with Editor's Trigger on net8.0 #19582

Closed

  • virtualized CollectionView with DataTemplateSelector (sometimes!) selects wrong item on gesturerecognizer with command on iOS #19408
  • when i change the XAML UI it doesn't update automatically. I need to restart the app to update the UI :( #19445
  • maui windows #19580
  • Allow Changing AppShell at runtime #16067
  • .NET MAUI app works both in debug and release mode on android but after publishing to apk. The app crashes on physical device. #19210
  • Toggling backlight causes UI to hang #19267
  • Maui App won't compile #19401
  • problem as i change the first thing #19455

PullRequests

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Database.Migrate fails after first run #32669
  • Linq to sql:The timeout occurred because the timestamp function was used when querying a time field, which caused the timeout #32671
  • Prune OPENJSON columns list #32668
    9.0.0

Closed

  • The timeout occurred because the timestamp function was used when querying a time field, which caused the timeout. #32667

PullRequests

Created

  • Track prunability of inner joins on the expression itself #32674
  • Prune SQL Server OPENJSON's WITH clause #32673
  • Redo SQL tree pruning #32672

Updated

  • Automatic use of C# primary constructors #32509
